EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-4731: Send email alert to an user when exception is denied
EmailTemplate.name: Product Selection Exception Denial Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Exception request for Opportunity {!Opportunity.Opportunitynum__c} has been denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Exception request for Legal Entity {!Opportunity.RequestedLegalEntity__c} on Opportunity {!Opportunity.Opportunitynum__c} has been denied. Please contact the Corporate Tax team for more details. Please find below the Opportunity record.
Opportunity Record: {!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks, IHS Markit
